aboutMe: The Generator App is an online tool that helps you to export ready-made templates ready to work as your future website. It helps you to combine slides, panels and other components and export it as a set of static files: HTML/CSS/JS.

education.company: Center of Excellence in Energy and Electronics
education.description: Computer technical support technician in the field of manufacturing, servicing, operating, installing, troubleshooting, testing and repairing computing technology.

licenseAndCertificates.description: During the program I learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript and basic web design principles
Learned the fundamentals of WordPress development, including theme customization, plugin implementation, and content management system (CMS) functionality.
